comments:
When I extend the Global Action handlers for extending the Copy, Cut and 
Paste Action, there is an exception while pasting the diagram object. This 
error is noticed in the GMF Ecore editor as well. Kindly let know a solution 
with which I can resolve this.

It seems that this bug only occurs if one tries to paste while the objects to be copied are still selected. When pointing to an empty space in the diagram and the performing the paste-action, everthing works fine.

It doesn't work fine even when pointing to an empty space in the diagram. It works fine only on the Logic Diagram Editor and I'm still wondering how!! On every other generated using the gmfgen, it fails to paste from the clipboard and throws the same exception as listed

Sorry, i forgot about something: to make things work you have to add the following to the plugin.xml of your diagram plug-in:
<extension point="org.eclipse.emf.ecore.extension_parser">
      <parser
         type="yourtype"
         class="org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.resources.GMFResourceFactory">
      </parser>
</extension>
So you have to register the extension parser not only for your *_diagram files, but also for the model files.
Moving to the next release, GMF 2.1.
